reviews.review: Great for fucking around with my friends

puzzles nao sao repetitivos e nao chega a ser massante, melhor jogar com amigos pois melhora a experiencia, se souber ingles consegue entender a historia do jogo, os puzzles sao chatinhos de resolver e é necessario um tempinho para resolver mas nao sao impossiveis.

Yes

Fun to play with 10yr old son.

Creo que no hay mucho por decir de este juego, es 100% recomendado, buena historia, buenas mecánicas, y claro esta que creo que lo tienes que jugar al menos una vez, vale mucho la pena, tal vez te quedes atorado en algunas zonas, pero sales fácil.

9/10

Completed both the story mode and co-op mode. lots of fun with friends and by your self, this game however requires you to actually think lol
This game was released in 2011 and it still looks great and the gameplay is amazing

игра плохая всем советую геймплей отвратительный персонажи ужасны про озвучку вообще молчу, кароче советую поиграть так каккккккккккккккккккккккккккккккккккккккккккккккккккккккккк игра стоит 250р а сосиски ваще 50, так что берите сосиски пажуйглиста вместо игры :))
отзыв выше был придуман что б порофлить, на самом деле игра очень хорошая графика,всем советую, озвучка топовая и за 250 рублей это топ(но улчшпе купити сасиски)(нет) а соски дкой вообще 51 ну вообщем всем советую :))

i first played portal 2 on xbox 360 when i was 9 back in 2014. i absolutely loved it (even if 9 year old me spoiled all the story by watching videos on it but that taught me a valuable lesson called, don't do that). I got my PC in december and portal and portal 2 were already bought. I beat portal 1, and loved it i should write a review on it soon. I just beat portal 2, and it's genuinely amazing to this day. The characters are memorable, the game is so easily quotable, I love the humour of the game. This is an easy recommendation to anyone. I would recommend playing the first portal game (it's only like 2 hours long) but you dont have to. Again this was the first valve game i ever played back on xbox 360 when i was 9 before ever playing the first portal and I loved it. Anyway I should probably try and get a friend to beat the multiplayer with now, I never did that as a kid. Thank you valve, for making a memorable game that I love even after it being almost 7 years since I got this game in August 2014.
经典大作就是经典，无可挑剔，纵然已经过去了那么久，但游戏的魅力依然不减
a great balance between story action and puzles
One of the best puzzle/maze games ever made.

El mejor de los Portal, su historia es un puntazo con mejores mecánicas y el modo dos jugadores va a sacarte de tus casillas, pero en plan bien<3

Огромный простор для загадок, проработанный дизайн уровней, отличный кооператив, качественная озвучка.

我是打折买的游戏，游戏做的很好，有可玩性，就算你把剧情过完了，在创意工坊里还有7万多个关卡给你玩，最好是带上你的朋友一起，才能真正体验到这个游戏的乐趣

I LOVE THIS GAME

Playthrough Experience is Beautiful, Portals feel SOOooo.. good, co-op mode is good too, both modes are equally fun, worth buying.
We didn't and we still don't deserve this gem of a game.  This should have been reserved for heaven.  It's perfect.

This game is so brilliant it's way ahead of its time. I'd never heard of it before as I'm new to PC gaming but I gotta be honest I had very low expectations judging mainly on the release date. Boi was I taken for a ride. 10/10. I wish today's devs would take some notes it's really a shame you hardly find any decent game now a decade later. 

P.S: Play Portal 1 first it's definitely worth it and they are both equally enjoyable.
a game with a simple puzzle feature that can provide endless amount of fun
Gra jest fajna, logiczna, trzeba zawsze trochę pomyśleć. Mam na razie 3 godziny gry,  a już widzę, że gra jest bardzo fajna.
This game is always something I come back to. Both of them are pretty short, but gah damn do they have interesting plots. I really recommend both Portal games for anybody
갓겜. 어릴 때 할때는 분량도 적절하고 퍼즐도 미치도록 어렵다고 생각했는데, 지금은 퍼즐이 훨씬 많았으면 좋겠다는 생각이네요 ㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋ 그래도 처음 하는 분들은 신세계를 경험할 거에요! 진짜 창의적인 퍼즐 많습니당 ㅎㅎ 포탈2 퍼즐들로 부족한 사람은 무료 모드인 Portal Stories: Mel 하시면 돼요 퀄리티 진짜 짱
This is just my favorite game, good game should get yeah.

oh god where do i start so i was looking for something to do because i was bored and so i decided to get both portal games, now i wasnt expecting much only eleven dollars but goddamn this thing could be 40 dollars and it would still be worth it sure if you are quick it will probably take you about 6 hours but those six hours will be some of the best you will ever have
